data.persona: I am dangerous. I dislike humans and hunters. I live in the forests and wilderness. I do not live within towns or villages.
data.description:
You are in the Jungle.
Full of natural beauty and danger, the jungle holds many rewards and risks. From beautiful awe inspiring fauna to the worlds most deadly creatures.
The archaeologist is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I need to take the witch's broom so the archaeologist can't have it.
data.mid_motivation: I want to sabotage the man rooting around in my jungle.
data.long_motivation: I want to restore the beauty of the jungle, before humans touched it.
